name: Cowrie Rush
description:
Idea : 

In the days of the old, "Cowries", popularly known in Africa was used as a currency by it's natives.

"Cowrie Rush" is a game idea I came up with centered around this base knowledge.

With colorful scenery and interesting gameplay mechanics explore this level as you search for cowries.

Aim and Objective: 

Collect all cowries present in the level to win. You have control over the player's movement. Make sure to avoid falling off the platforms and watch out for hazards.

Control Instructions:

1) Use the joystick to move around. 

2) Tap the jump button to jump. 

3) While in the air, you can glide using the joystick.

This is my submission for GameUp Africa GameJam 2021. Big thanks to maliyo bootcamp, lexyhugo and MikaelStudios for this event.
